description: Firefox Guide recommends Firefox features that are likely to benefit you. It is an experimental addon and will be removed automatically.
name: firefoxguide
title: Firefox Guide Study 1
author: Kamyar Ardekani <kamyar@mozilla.com>

preferences.name: cleanup_on_death
preferences.title: Clean up remained data when the addon is killed

preferences.name: clean_startup
preferences.title: Reset preferences and data upon each startup

preferences.name: clean_install
preferences.title: Reset preferences and data upon installation

preferences.name: cleanup_handled_by_xutils
preferences.title: Delegate clean up to shield studies utils
preferences.description: If set, disable and end-of-study clean up will be handled by the shield addon utils.

preferences.name: death_handled_by_xutils
preferences.title: Delegate death timing to shield studies utils

preferences.name: survey_handled_by_xutils
preferences.title: Delegate survey opening to shield studies utils
preferences.description: If set, disable and end-of-study survey opening will be handled by the shield addon utils.

preferences.name: passive_mode
preferences.title: Prevent the addon from showing notifications.

preferences.name: recomm_list_address
preferences.title: Feature recommendation list
preferences.description: Address of the feature recommendations list to load.

preferences.name: exclude_tags
preferences.title: Exclude features with these tags
preferences.description: Exclude features with these tags from the recommendations list. Tags are separated with semi-colons.

preferences.name: timer.random_interval_length_tick
preferences.title: Maximum length of the random time interval

preferences.name: timer.inactive_threshold_s
preferences.title: User inactivity threshold
preferences.description: Minimum length of inactivity time to conclude user inactivity

preferences.name: timer.recently_active_threshold_s
preferences.title: User activity threshold
preferences.description: Maximum length of activity time to conclude user has become active recently

preferences.name: delivery.mode.silence_length.easy
preferences.title: Length of the easy rate limit mode (ticks)

preferences.name: delivery.mode.silence_length.strict
preferences.title: Length of the strict rate limit mode (ticks)

preferences.name: logger.recent_hist_count
preferences.title: Number of recent log messages to keep
preferences.description: Maximum number of log records to store when connection fails.

preferences.name: experiment.live_forever
preferences.title: Let the study live forever in the end stage

preferences.name: experiment.default_delMode_weights
preferences.title: Random mode assignment weights
preferences.description: These are weights based on which the user is randomly put into an experimental mode

preferences.name: experiment.name
preferences.title: Name of the very deployed experiment

preferences.name: experiment.obs1_length_tick
preferences.title: Length of the first observation period (ticks)

preferences.name: experiment.obs2_length_tick
preferences.title: Length of the second observation period

preferences.name: route.default_coefficient
preferences.title: Base coefficient scaling the triggering behavior thresholds

preferences.name: sender.resend_period
preferences.title: Log resend interval (ticks)
preferences.description: How often the sender should retry sending the queued messages

preferences.name: sender.queue_quota
preferences.title: Number of recent log messages to resend
preferences.description: The number of messages that can be stored in the queue before they start to drop.

preferences.name: presentation.doorhanger.autofade_time_ms_per_word
preferences.title: Doorhanger per word auto fade time (milliseconds/word)

preferences.name: presentation.doorhanger.exitfade_time_ms_per_word
preferences.title: Doorhanger per word auto fade time on mouse exit (milliseconds/word)

preferences.name: presentation.doorhanger.button_unlight_delay
preferences.title: Set how long the bulb icon should remain lit (seconds)
